name: Heaven Bomb Squad
description:
*Note! Computer Keyboard Required

Master the keyboard in a way have never thought of!

What if all the keyboard keys were the controller of the game?  This is Heaven Bomb Squad, A Keyboard Rage Game, testing your ability to traverse the keyboard in various ways that don't resemble typing.

Make your way to the end of the game to fight the boss, do it as fast as you can and rank highest on the leaderboard!

Contains: 

- 20 levels to test your speed and accuracy
- 2 boss fights
